encounter.name: Milok and Skrak, two Orc Scouts
encounter.precis: These scouts are running ahead of the main force of orcs to flush out any resistance.
encounter.threats: Orcs will continue to arrive until the characters are overwhelmed.
encounter.treats: Confirms the presence of orcs in the area.
encounter.progression: Raises the alarm and sets the short term goals for the characters.

strategy.p: Orcs are stupid and aggressive. Milok will yell out loudly "I haff found der humans!" then he will attack until he is killed or his opponents flee. If his opponents flee he will pursue if he is not yet bloodied. If there's any hesitation Milok says "I am going to kill you with my Choppa!" (All Orcs talk like Arnold Schwarzeneggar)
If the PCs hide use an opposed Perception versus Hide to determine if he dinfs them.

encounter.outs: Milok and Shrak die. The characters can just run.
